This can include clothing styles, music genres, art forms, symbols, languages, traditions, and more. While cultural exchange has been part of human history, concerns arise when members of dominant cultures adopt aspects of marginalized cultures without acknowledging or addressing power imbalances, leading to exploitation, erasure, or trivialization of those cultures' unique identities and histories.
